sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: "AccessView",
  data() {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      tab: 0,
      tabs: [
          'Accedi', 'Registrati'
      ]
    }
  }
}
</script>

<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-card
      flat
    >
      <v-tabs
        v-model="tab"
        background-color="primary"
        grow
        small
      >
        <v-tabs-slider color="secondary"></v-tabs-slider>
        <v-tab
          v-for="tab in tabs"
          v-bind:key="tab"
          color="secondary"
        >
          {{ tab }}
        </v-tab>
      </v-tabs>
      <v-card-text v-show="tab==1">
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Nome"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Cognome"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Username"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Password"
                required
                type="password"
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Conferma Password"
                required
                type="password"
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>

            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Email"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Numero di telefono"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12">
              <v-text-field
                label="Indirizzo"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-btn
            color="primary"
            @click="dialog = false"
          >
            Chiudi
          </v-btn>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn
            color="secondary"
            @click="dialog = false"
          >
            Registrati
          </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              Hai gia' un account?
            </v-col>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-col
              align="right"
            >
              <v-btn
                small
                v-on:click="tab=0"
              >Accedi</v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-card-text>

      <v-card-text v-show="tab==0">
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Username"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Password"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-btn
            color="primary"
            @click="dialog = false"
          >
            Chiudi
          </v-btn>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn
            color="secondary"
            @click="dialog = false"
          >
            Accedi
          </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              Non hai un account?
            </v-col>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-col
              align="right"
            >
              <v-btn
                small
                v-on:click="tab=1"
              >Registrati</v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-card-text>

    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<style scoped>

</style>
